subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a career year at the plate, Cubs third baseman Aramis Ramírez gave up a chance to explore the free-agent market Sunday, agreeing to a five-year, $73 million contract to stay in Chicago.
snippet: Coming off a career year at the plate, Cubs third baseman Aramis Ramírez gave up a chance to explore the free-agent market Sunday, agreeing to a five-year, $73 million contract to stay in Chicago.
